PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by the Province of BRITISH COLUMBIA of its statutory powers to take some 0.5 hectares of KAMLOOPS INDIAN RESERVE NO. 1 for highway purposes or other works of public utility, and (b) authorizing the transfer of those lands to the Province, in lieu of their expropriation.
